text: Nicholas E. Macioci (September 19, 1927 â€“ December 24, 2000), known as Nick Massi, was one of the original members of The Four Seasons. Nick Massi was the bass guitarist, but he also sang the deep, bass vocals. In the 1960s, The Four Seasons had many Hit Songs, for example "Sherry", "Big Girls don't Cry", "Walk like a Man", "Ain't that a Shame", "Marlena", etc. Nick Massi added bass vocals, to complement Frankie Valli's falsetto lead voice. title: Nick Massi
